title: Challenge-Based Global Competency Development Program: Collaboration and Problem-Solving for Language Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and experience adapting to online learning environments
context.additional_context: An asynchronous learning environment where current language professionals collaborate with multicultural teams using online tools to address global issues.

learning_goals: Learners can implement effective communication strategies considering cultural differences through real-world global case analysis.
Learners can propose solutions to overcome language barriers by collaborating with international teams using online collaboration tools.
Learners can produce and evaluate project outcomes addressing global social responsibility issues in portfolio format.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
